projects.title: Kinetic Typography
projects.description: A dynamic exploration of typography in motion, showcasing various animation principles and text-based storytelling techniques to bring words to life.

projects.title: VFX Compositing Shot
projects.description: A complex visual effects shot integrating a CG element into live-action footage. This project focused on achieving realistic lighting, shadows, and color grading for a seamless composite.

projects.title: 3D Product Visualization
projects.description: Photorealistic rendering of a conceptual high-tech product. This project emphasized studio lighting, advanced material creation, and creating a polished, commercial look.

projects.title: App UI Animation
projects.description: Designing and animating the user interface for a conceptual mobile app. The focus was on creating smooth, intuitive transitions that enhance the user experience.

projects.title: Abstract Glitch Art
projects.description: An experimental piece using datamoshing and procedural effects to create a visually striking abstract animation. It explores themes of digital decay and technological beauty.

projects.title: World Building Concept Art
projects.description: A series of digital paintings developing the visual world for a fictional sci-fi story. The collection focuses on environment design, mood, and architectural styles.

about.bio: I'm a digital artist and storyteller specializing in motion design and VFX. Currently honing my craft at CSMU, I'm driven by a passion for creating visuals that are not only technically polished but also emotionally resonant. My goal is to build immersive experiences, one frame at a time.
